message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Time is money, you know.
Alice, your offer was a bit too lopsided. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This accounts for the time value and gives us both a decent share.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. We're losing money over this. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly before inflation eats away at our gains.
